name: @gkalpak/saucelabs-testbed
description: A testbed project to play around with SauceLabs stuff.

scripts.reset: git add --all && (git commit -m BACKUP || git rev-parse --short HEAD) && git reset --hard v0.0.1-pristine && rm -rf node_modules/ && npm install
scripts.retag: git tag --delete v0.0.1-pristine && git push --delete origin v0.0.1-pristine && git tag --message="v0.0.1-pristine" v0.0.1-pristine && git push --tags origin

author: George Kalpakas <kalpakas.g@gmail.com>
